pr_title: [repository] Error reporting on Repositories in RepositoriesView

timeline.message:
[libg] Additions

- IO.closeAll
- A name for an exception type to display
- Remote test for URI

Signed-off-by: Peter Kriens <Peter.Kriens@aqute.biz>

[icons] Added an Icon manager

This manager caches and it can created decorated 
images.

Signed-off-by: Peter Kriens <Peter.Kriens@aqute.biz>

[icon] Icon support for repos

Added icons support to the repositories view. The
repository can now return an icon name and status
information that is used to visualize any problems
with the repo

Signed-off-by: Peter Kriens <Peter.Kriens@aqute.biz>

[icons2] Adaptation of the MavenBndRepository

The MavenBndRepository is overhauled to support the
new icons and to have better error handling.

The plugin will now do more validation but it will
not throw an exception when validation fails. It
will have a non-null status and return default
answers to the API.



Signed-off-by: Peter Kriens <Peter.Kriens@aqute.biz>

[lgtm] Too many format specifiers

Signed-off-by: Peter Kriens <Peter.Kriens@aqute.biz>
